titles.title: A bill to convey certain real property located in Tongass National Forest to Daniel J. Gross, Sr., and Douglas K. Gross, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6761)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of Agriculture, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-463.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Department of Agriculture. Unfavorable.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 5/27/1993--Introduced. Conveys certain real property in Tongass National Forest in Alaska to certain named individuals.
